alert.note: Alert for Holmes; North Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 12:56PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Walton and southwestern Holmes Counties through 1230 PM CDT... At 1156 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of De Funiak Springs, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Union, Liberty, Ponce De Leon, Cluster Springs, Sand Hill, Cerrogordo, Prosperity, Arrant Settlement, Glendale, Pleasant Hill, Center Ridge, Hickory Hill, Piney Grove and Baker Settlement. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Florida.
